name: Citizens Financial Group, Inc.
description: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. is a publicly traded bank holding company headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island. Founded in 1828, Citizens Bank has grown to become one of the largest financial institutions in the United States, offering a wide range of financial services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. Citizens provides a comprehensive suite of banking products including personal and business banking, consumer and commercial lending, and wealth management services. The bank is known for its customer-centric approach, emphasizing personalized service and community involvement. Citizens has a significant footprint across the New England, Mid-Atlantic, and Midwest regions, with hundreds of branches and ATMs available for customer convenience. The company has been recognized for its commitment to responsible banking and community engagement, actively participating in initiatives that support economic development and environmental sustainability. As a member of the Fortune 500, Citizens Financial Group aims to innovate in the financial sector, leveraging technology to enhance customer experience and streamline operations. With a focus on growth and efficiency, the company continues to adapt to the changing financial landscape while maintaining its core values of integrity and service excellence.
